articles.author: Phumi Ramalepe
articles.title: Hackers demand R1.1bn ransom from TransUnion and Experian - threaten to leak personal data of South Africans
articles.description: TransUnion and Experian are facing threats from hackers known as N4ughtySecTU, claiming that they have penetrated both agencies' systems and obtained sensitive financial and personal data of South Africans.
articles.content: • TransUnion and Experian, two major South African credit bureaus, are being targeted by hacking group N4ughtySecTU, claiming they have access to personal information of South Africans.
